languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: All DoT effects deal half the usual damage to Executioner and his party. Stacks multiplicatively (half for 1 Executioner with this talent, quarter for 2, etc).

When the Executioner or their party members are under any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, these effects deal 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} only. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this talent in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

When the Executioner or their party members are under any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, these effects deal 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} only. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this talent in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

Whenever the Executioner or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this talent in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} o los miembros de su grupo sufren cualquier efecto de daño continuado, dicho efecto solo inflige un 50 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Se acumula de forma multiplicativa (50 % de daño si hay un ejecutor con este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} en el grupo, 25 % si hay dos, etc.).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} o los miembros de su grupo sufren cualquier efecto de daño continuado, dicho efecto solo inflige un 50 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Se acumula de forma multiplicativa (50 % de daño si hay un ejecutor con este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} en el grupo, 25 % si hay dos, etc.).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}またはその部隊メンバーが継続ダメージ効果を受けるたび、この効果はその{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の50%しか与えない。この効果は蒸散的にスタックする（部隊にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を持つエクスキューショナーが1人いる場合はダメージ50%、部隊にこの才能を持つエクスキューショナーが2人いる場合はダメージ25%）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}またはその部隊メンバーが継続ダメージ効果を受けるたび、この効果はその{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の50%しか与えない。この効果は蒸散的にスタックする（部隊にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を持つエクスキューショナーが1人いる場合はダメージ50%、部隊にこの才能を持つエクスキューショナーが2人いる場合はダメージ25%）。

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}或队友承受持续伤害效果时，此类效果都只造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的50%，此效果以乘算叠加。（例如，若队伍中有1名拥有此{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}的行刑者，此类效果会造成50%伤害。若队伍中有2名拥有此天赋的行刑者，则此类效果只会造成25%伤害，以此类推。）
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}或队友承受持续伤害效果时，此类效果都只造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的50%，此效果以乘算叠加。（例如，若队伍中有1名拥有此{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}的行刑者，此类效果会造成50%伤害。若队伍中有2名拥有此天赋的行刑者，则此类效果只会造成25%伤害，以此类推。）

languages.text: Wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} oder ein Gruppenmitglied mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegt, verursachen diese nur 50 % ihres {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}. Mehrmals stapelbar (50 % Schaden, wenn es in der Gruppe einen Henker mit diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} gibt, 25 % Schaden, wenn es in der Gruppe zwei Henker mit diesem Talent gibt usw.)
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: Wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} oder ein Gruppenmitglied mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegt, verursachen diese nur 50 % ihres {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}. Mehrmals stapelbar (50 % Schaden, wenn es in der Gruppe einen Henker mit diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} gibt, 25 % Schaden, wenn es in der Gruppe zwei Henker mit diesem Talent gibt usw.)

languages.text: Les effets de dégâts progressifs subis par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} ou les membres de son groupe n'infligent que 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Cumulable de manière multiplicative (50 % de dégâts si le groupe comprend un exécuteur avec ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, 25 % de dégâts si le groupe comprend deux exécuteurs avec ce talent, etc.).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: Les effets de dégâts progressifs subis par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} ou les membres de son groupe n'infligent que 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Cumulable de manière multiplicative (50 % de dégâts si le groupe comprend un exécuteur avec ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, 25 % de dégâts si le groupe comprend deux exécuteurs avec ce talent, etc.).

languages.text: Эффекты периодического урона, действующие на {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} и членов его отряда, наносят им только 50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Эффект суммируется мультипликативно (50% урона, если в отряде один палач с этим {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантом{/g}, 25% урона, если в отряде два таких палача, и т. д.)
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)

traits.locale_text: Эффекты периодического урона, действующие на {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} и членов его отряда, наносят им только 50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Эффект суммируется мультипликативно (50% урона, если в отряде один палач с этим {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантом{/g}, 25% урона, если в отряде два таких палача, и т. д.)

Эффекты периодического урона, действующие на {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} и членов его отряда, наносят им только 50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Эффект суммируется мультипликативно (50% урона, если в отряде один палач с этим {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантом{/g}, 25% урона, если в отряде два таких палача, и т. д.)

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g} veya grup üyelerinden biri, herhangi bir zamanla hasar veren etkiye maruz kaldığında bu etkiler, normaldeki {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlarının{/g} yalnızca %50'sini verirler. Çarpımsal olarak üst üste birikir (Grupta bu beceriye sahip bir Cellat varsa %50 hasar, grupta bu {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceriye{/g} sahip iki Cellat varsa %25 hasar, vs.)
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} or their party members are suffering from any damage-over-time effects, these effects deal only 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks multiplicatively (50% damage if there is one Executioner with this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} in the party, 25% damage if there are two Executioners with this talent in the party, etc.)
